name: Jane Doe
message: She got healed of many illnesses
text: Before coming here, I felt so average. Royalties Youth taught me I was created for more! The messages, the friendships, the love... it's all so real. I'm finally living a life of purpose and victory.

name: John Smith
message: I found my purpose in Christ
text: Before coming here, I felt so average. Royalties Youth taught me I was created for more! The messages, the friendships, the love... it's all so real. I'm finally living a life of purpose and victory.
